description: The items detailed below are required by the Department of National Defence.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Title and Reference Number

**Electro-Optic Spare Parts**
**Pièces de rechange électro-optiques**

Reference Number: PW-23-01021743
Amendment Number: 1
Solicitation Number: W8486-238982/AS

## Tender Details

* Tender Closing Date: February 28, 2023, 14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: None
* Tender Status: Expired

## Goods and Services Identification Number (GSIN) and Description

The following GSIN numbers and descriptions are applicable to this tender:

* NIB 5935: Connectors, Electrical – Repair
* NIB 1240: Optical Sighting and Ranging Equipment
* NIB 1240E: Optical Sighting and Ranging Equipment, Electrical and Electronic
* NIB 5120: Hand Tools, Non-edged, Non-powered
* NIB 5895: Control, Interface

## Procurement Details

* Procurement Method: Competitive – Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: None
* Limited Tendering Reason: None

## Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

## Regions of Opportunity and Delivery

* Regions of Opportunity: Unspecified
* Regions of Delivery: Canada

## Contracting Entity and Contact Information

The contracting entity for this tender is the Department of National Defence.

Name: De Bellefeuille, Eric
Email: eric.debellefeuille2@forces.gc.ca
Phone: 819-939-5254
Fax: None

## Tender Description

The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the following electro-optic spare parts:

1. Battery, Non-rechargeable (GSIN: 6135; NSN: 6135-12-308-9723)
2. Cable Assembly, Special Purpose, Electrical (GSIN: 5995; NSN: 5995-99-287-3193)
3. Telescoping Adapter (GSIN: 1240; NSN: 1240-00-613-5750)
...
33.
